subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Cory Stillman's power-play goal 8 minutes 46 seconds into overtime capped a comeback from a two-goal deficit as the Hurricanes took a 3-2 lead in the series.
snippet: Cory Stillman's power-play goal 8 minutes 46 seconds into overtime capped a comeback from a two-goal deficit as the Hurricanes took a 3-2 lead in the series.
